content.rendered:
Built for the Future
of Regenerative Aesthetics.

Learn More About
Tiger Aesthetics Products

A Transformative Portfolio

Tiger Aesthetics’ unique portfolio and approach enables our customers to differentiate their practices and build new revenue streams, inside and outside the operating room. As we grow alongside our customers, we will introduce new modalities for body rejuvenation, create transformative treatments for facial aesthetics and continue to innovate in breast aesthetics.

 

A new standard in cellulite treatment

The first Structural Adipose Tissue designed for use in aesthetic body procedures

The first FDA cleared 5-year filler3

The only fat transfer system with a surfactant shown to enhance the survival of fat cells2

Silicone gel breast implants with an unrivaled safety profile1

Universal no-touch implant delivery device

The first and only breast tissue expander with an integrated drain

Soft shell, single-port breast tissue expander

The first absorbable suture FDA-cleared for cosmetic facial procedures4

A PRP platform that delivers ideal platelet concentrations5

Learn more about our
innovative technologies   Technologies

Innovative Tissue Technologies

Regeneration is a life-long process that impacts each patient differently, depending on age and lifestyle. We’re launching new technologies to help patients enhance their unique regenerative journey through all stages of life, introducing meaningful regenerative aesthetics treatments head-to-toe.

Learn more about our
innovative technologies

Harness the power of regenerative aesthetics.

Contact a Representative Find a Provider REFERENCES:
  1. Stevens WG, et al. Ten-year core study data for Sientra’s Food and Drug Administration -approved round and shaped breast implants with cohesive silicone gel. Plast Reconstr Surg. 2018; 141(4S):7S-19S.
  2. Medina MA 3rd, et al. Polymer therapy: a novel treatment to improve fat graft viability. Plast Reconstr Surg. 2011 Jun; 127(6):2270-2282. doi: 10.1097/PRS.0b013e3182139fc1. PMID: 21617461
  3. Bellafill® [US Instructions for Use]. San Diego, CA: Suneva Medical, Inc.; 2023.
  4. Silhouette InstaLift™ [US Instructions for Use]. Irvine, CA: Sinclair Pharmaceuticals; 2021.
  5. Amplifine HD PRP Gel Tube (15 and 30 mL) [Instructions for Use]. San Diego, CA: Suneva Medical, Inc.; 2020.
